q: Amelia Torres, spokeswoman for competition issues at the commission, in a Wall Street Journal This all stems from a story published in The Sunday Telegraph in which the reporter( not lame duck CEO Eric Schmidt ) said Google could be willing to change some of its algorithm methodology in search.
